This app needs access to location to show your position on the map and track your ride.
This app needs access to location to track your ride even when the app is in the background.
This app needs access to location to track your ride both when in use and in the background.
This app needs access to camera to take photos for your trip memories.
This app needs access to photo library to save and share your trip photos.
This app needs permission to save photos to your photo library.
This app needs access to microphone to record audio notes for your trips.
This app needs access to contacts to help you share trip details with friends.
This app needs access to calendar to add trip events and reminders.
This app sends notifications about trip updates and reminders.
This app uses motion data to track your activities during trips.
This app uses Bluetooth to connect with nearby devices and share trip information.
This app uses Bluetooth to connect with nearby devices.
This app uses Face ID for secure authentication to protect your trip data.
This app needs access to local network to discover and connect to nearby devices.
This app needs access to documents to save and manage your trip files.
This app uses speech recognition to convert your voice notes to text.
This app integrates with Siri to provide voice shortcuts for trip management.
This app reads health data to track your fitness activities during trips.
This app writes health data to record your trip activities.
